long_description: This women's Fizik Vesta bike saddle offers a central channel and a flexible, supportive shell to enhance comfort when you're riding. Synthetic Microtex cover is durable, water resistant and washable, and it will not fade; plus, it's lighter weight than leather. Central channel spans the length of the saddle to offer a relief zone for sensitive tissues. Wing Flex design enables outer edges of saddle to flex downward when the inner thigh contacts the saddle, helping increase comfort and pedaling efficiency. Nylon/carbon-reinforced shell provides lightweight support and comfort. K:ium alloy rails offer an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and comfort-enhancing vibration damping. Integrated Clip System (ICS) enables quick, easy tool-free attachment of compatible Fizik accessories, such as saddle bags or lights (not included).
short_description: This women's Fizik Vesta bike saddle offers a central channel and a flexible, supportive shell to enhance comfort when you're riding.
